docs.text: 彩票项目部署 ¶ Lottery LotteryApi LotteryLib LotteryMis Lottery (依赖库)： ¶ 主要修改以下文件： Lottery/conf/rls/application.ini (定义 memcached 服务的相关配置) [ product ] application . directory = APP_PATH application . library = ROOT_PATH "/library" application . dispatcher . catchException = TRUE application . dispatcher . throwException = TRUE ; smarty 配置 smarty . template_dir = APP_PATH "/views/" smarty . compile_dir = ROOT_PATH "/logs/smarty/templates_c/" smarty . cache_dir = ROOT_PATH "/logs/smarty/cache/" smarty . suffix = "tpl" smarty . plugins_dir = APP_PATH "/views/plugin/" ; cookie 配置 cookie . domain = ".p2peye.com" cookie . tid = ' TYID ' ; 日志配置 log . file = ROOT_PATH ' / logs / ui . log ' ; discuz配置 discuz . cookie_prefix = "A4gK_" discuz . cookie_path = "/" discuz . cookie_domain = ".p2peye.com" discuz . uckey = "e1zc3d7fDcQ73aXf98v1aaw7R1D1acv2Teza4efevbwfv7d631Zcrdg2W8TcKbVb" discuz . authkey = "e21217j6ZsoeRAf0" ; ; upload 上传目录配置 upload . rootSrc = ROOT_PATH "/upload" upload . shareSrc = ROOT_PATH "/upload/share" ; local : 本地配置 ; test : 测试环境配置 ; rls : 发布配置 ; memcached ; memcached . host = "192.168.2.192" memcached . host = "192.168.2.93" memcached . port = "12306" LotteryApi (依赖库)： ¶ 主要修改以下文件： LotteryApi/conf/rls/application.ini (定义 memcached 服务的相关配置) [ product ] application . directory = APP_PATH application . library = ROOT_PATH "/library" application . dispatcher . catchException = TRUE application . dispatcher . throwException = TRUE ; smarty 配置 smarty . template_dir = APP_PATH "/views/" smarty . compile_dir = ROOT_PATH "/logs/smarty/templates_c/" smarty . cache_dir = ROOT_PATH "/logs/smarty/cache/" smarty . suffix = "tpl" smarty . plugins_dir = APP_PATH "/views/plugin/" ; cookie 配置 cookie . domain = ".p2peye.com" cookie . tid = ' TYID ' ; 日志配置 log . file = ROOT_PATH ' / logs / ui . log ' ; discuz配置 discuz . cookie_prefix = "A4gK_" discuz . cookie_path = "/" discuz . cookie_domain = ".p2peye.com" discuz . uckey = "e1zc3d7fDcQ73aXf98v1aaw7R1D1acv2Teza4efevbwfv7d631Zcrdg2W8TcKbVb" discuz . authkey = "e21217j6ZsoeRAf0" ; ; upload 上传目录配置 upload . rootSrc = ROOT_PATH "/upload" upload . shareSrc = ROOT_PATH "/upload/share" ; local : 本地配置 ; test : 测试环境配置 ; rls : 发布配置 ; memcached ; memcached . host = "192.168.2.192" memcached . host = "192.168.2.91" memcached . port = "12306" LotteryLib (依赖库)： ¶ 主要修改以下文件： LotteryLib/conf/rls/cache.php (memcache配置) <?php /** * * @author Abel * email:abel.zhou@hotmail.com * 2014-9-23 * UTF-8 */ $cache = array ( 'memcache' => array ( array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.91' , 'port' => '12306' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.91' , 'port' => '12307' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.91' , 'port' => '12308' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.92' , 'port' => '12306' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.92' , 'port' => '12307' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.92' , 'port' => '12308' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.93' , 'port' => '12306' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.93' , 'port' => '12307' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.93' , 'port' => '12308' , 'weight' => '10' ), ) , 'memcached' => array ( array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.91' , 'port' => '12306' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.91' , 'port' => '12307' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.91' , 'port' => '12308' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.92' , 'port' => '12306' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.92' , 'port' => '12307' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.92' , 'port' => '12308' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.93' , 'port' => '12306' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.93' , 'port' => '12307' , 'weight' => '10' ), array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.93' , 'port' => '12308' , 'weight' => '10' ), ) ); return $cache ; - LotteryLib/conf/rls/db.php (mysql配置) <?php /** * * @author Abel * email:abel.zhou@hotmail.com * 2014-9-22 * UTF-8 */ // Lottery $db [ 'lottery' ] = array ( 'writer' => array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.200' , 'port' => '3357' , 'user' => 'mysql_write' , 'password' => '123' , 'database' => 'lottery' , 'charset' => 'utf8' ), 'reader' => array ( array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.100' , 'port' => '3357' , 'user' => 'mysql_read' , 'password' => '123' , 'database' => 'lottery' , 'charset' => 'utf8' ), ) ); //lottery_mis $db [ 'lottery_mis' ] = array ( 'writer' => array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.200' , 'port' => '3357' , 'user' => 'mysql_write' , 'password' => '123' , 'database' => 'lottery_mis' , 'charset' => 'utf8' ), 'reader' => array ( array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.100' , 'port' => '3357' , 'user' => 'mysql_read' , 'password' => '123' , 'database' => 'lottery_mis' , 'charset' => 'utf8' ), ) ); //lottery_message $db [ 'lottery_message' ] = array ( 'writer' => array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.200' , 'port' => '3357' , 'user' => 'mysql_write' , 'password' => '123' , 'database' => 'lottery_message' , 'charset' => 'utf8' ), 'reader' => array ( array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.100' , 'port' => '3357' , 'user' => 'mysql_read' , 'password' => '123' , 'database' => 'lottery_message' , 'charset' => 'utf8' ), ) ); //lottery_number $db [ 'lottery_number' ] = array ( 'writer' => array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.200' , 'port' => '3357' , 'user' => 'mysql_write' , 'password' => '123' , 'database' => 'lottery_number' , 'charset' => 'utf8' ), 'reader' => array ( array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.100' , 'port' => '3357' , 'user' => 'mysql_read' , 'password' => '123' , 'database' => 'lottery_number' , 'charset' => 'utf8' ), ) ); return $db ; - LotteryLib/conf/rls/es.php (es配置) <?php /** * * 2018-8-3 * UTF-8 */ $config [ 'local' ] = array ( '192.168.2.10:9200' ); $config [ 'test' ] = array ( '127.0.0.1:9200' ); $config [ 'rls' ] = array ( '192.168.2.250:9200' ); return $config ; - LotteryLib/conf/rls/grpc.php (图片识别) <?php return [ 'ocr' => [ 'host' => '192.168.2.57' , 'port' => '50051' , 'opts' => array ( 'credentials' => Grpc\ChannelCredentials :: createInsecure (), ), 'channel' => null ] ]; - LotteryLib/conf/rls/push.php <?php return array ( "cp_push" => array ( "key" => "c6ca75b809ef6b97a70f0867" , "secret" => "a00ddf119173c6b1d1651b30" ), //出彩极光 "flymepush" => array ( "key" => "119240" , "secret" => "ae4777526c3e44a2b197936ecb3162c1" ), //魅族 "huaweipush" => array ( "key" => "100722725" , "secret" => "52d9fb19b784a548842d2b20751b5ff9d96ee2bb13ab9edaef4e61b042f3af5d" ), //华为 "mipush" => array ( "key" => "" , "secret" => "mudXrZWpLJ0F0aInFGLc7w==" ), //小米 // "huaweipush" => array("key" => "100669369", "secret" => "fd78b3031ef810ea8f8ef41b5676b032"),//华为 // "mipush" => array("key" => "", "secret" => "aHY/rDBUA7mSO6AoAFrNbg=="),//华为 // "oppopush" => array("key" => "", "secret" => ""),//OPPO ); - LotteryLib/conf/rls/redis.php (redis配置) <?php /** * */ $config = array ( 'host' => '192.168.2.91' , 'port' => '16379' , 'auth' => '' ); return $config ; - LotteryLib/conf/rls/swoole.php <?php $config [ 'local' ] = array ( ); $config [ 'test' ] = array ( ); $config [ 'rls' ] = array ( ); LotteryMis (依赖库)： ¶ 主要修改以下文件： LotteryMis/conf/rls/mis.ini(mis配置) [ common ] application . directory = APPLICATION_DIRECTORY application . library = APPLICATION_DIRECTORY "/../library/" application . dispatcher . catchException = TRUE application . dispatcher . throwException = TRUE ; 路由配置，顺序很重要 ; 首页 routes . licaiindex . type = "rewrite" routes . licaiindex . match = "licai.html" routes . licaiindex . route . controller = "Licai" routes . licaiindex . route . action = "index" ; 修改个人密码 routes . Password . type = "rewrite" routes . Password . match = "editPassword.html" routes . Password . route . controller = "user" routes . Password . route . action = "editPassword" [ product : common ] ; 图片上传配置 uploadImg . bankIcon = ROOT_PATH ' / static / images / bank_icons / ' uploadImg . ForumPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / forum / ' uploadImg . recommendedPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / recommended / ' uploadImg . companyPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / company / ' uploadImg . topicPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / topic / ' uploadImg . picPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / pic / ' uploadImg . teamPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / team / ' uploadImg . iconPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / icon / ' uploadImg . ad = ROOT_PATH ' / static / images / ad / ' uploadImg . tea = ROOT_PATH ' / static / images / tea / ' uploadImg . managerHead = ROOT_PATH ' / static / images / manager / ' uploadImg . MobilePath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / mobile / ' uploadFile . sqlFile = ROOT_PATH ' / data / sql / ' uploadFile . excelFile = ROOT_PATH ' / data / excel / ' uploadImg . appwall = ' / home / yx / sites / p2peye / data / attachment / appwall / ' uploadImg . HomeNewsPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / homenews / ' uploadImg . AdvertisementPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / advertisement / ' uploadImg . FriendslinkPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / friendslink / ' uploadImg . infoPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / info / ' uploadImg . SpiderPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / spider / ' uploadImg . OnlineActivityPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / online / ' uploadImg . AppAdvertisementPath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / app_advertisement / ' ; 20170718 uploadImg . MagazinePath = ROOT_PATH ' / .. / p2peye / static / magazine / ' ; cookie 配置 cookie . domain = ".p2peye.com" cookie . uid = "PID" cookie . city = "PCITY" ; 日志配置 log . file = ROOT_PATH ' / logs / mis . log ' log . level = "0xFF" db . ip = "192.168.2.200" db . user = "mysql_write" db . password = "123.com@cn" db . port = "3357" ; memcached 配置 ; memcached . host = "192.168.2.192" memcached . host = "192.168.2.93" memcached . port = "12306" memcached . city_key = "MEMCACHED_CITY" memcached . bank_key = "MEMCACHED_BANK" ; smarty 配置 smarty . template_dir = APPLICATION_DIRECTORY "/views/" smarty . compile_dir = ROOT_PATH "/logs/smarty/templates_c/" smarty . cache_dir = ROOT_PATH "/logs/smarty/cache/" smarty . suffix = "tpl" smarty . plugins_dir = APPLICATION_DIRECTORY "/views/plugin/" ; 登录 token logon . key = "wdty2018" 返回顶部
